room_title: Escape room "The Plight of Corndog Crockett" by Maggie Valley Puzzle Rooms in Maggie Valley
room_description:
Corndog Crockett has been arrested by federal agents, and now his biggest rival, Squirrely Smith, has been tipped off about the location of Corndog’s moonshine still. Squirrely has wanted Corndog’s recipe for years and now is his chance to get it.
You are in his hidden shack in the woods, and you have to find Corndog’s recipe and get out before Squirrely and his sidekick get here in one hour. If Squirrely finds you here, he will “eliminate” his competition, which means you.
